content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, research set to automation, electrical_id updated to 24508.
- ElectricityGroup (id 24508) connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (9.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) used for producing electricity; warnings: "not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"; status NOT_CONNECTED; connection points at positions (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; status NO_FUEL with warning "out of fuel"; connection points at positions (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); linked to fluid_system 120395; steam_output_point at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) used for water intake; status WORKING; connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); linked to fluid_system 120395.
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) serving as the manual fuel feeding system.
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
  • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 120395, status WORKING.
  • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 120394, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system = 120407, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system = 120406, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 120402, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system = 120411, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 120410, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 120413, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 120414, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system = 120415, status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Repeated Pipe Group Connection Failures:
  - Multiple connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system identifiers [119731, 119815, 119897, 119981, 120063, 120147, 120229, 120313] failed to locate any candidates within a 15-unit radius at position (-5.5, 19.5).
  - Tip: Validate and consistently use the current active fluid_system identifier (120395) from the pipeline network and confirm the presence of candidate pipe groups within the designated search radius.

• Inconsistent Fluid System References:
  - Outdated or incorrect fluid_system identifiers have been used across multiple connection attempts, leading to aborts.
  - Tip: Always verify and update fluid_system references in line with the active network configuration prior to initiating connection attempts.
